strategy_reasoning: Using the metaphor of a 'community garden' to represent open-source contribution fits our nature-themed brand perfectly. The pixel art style makes the technical aspect of 'updating documentation' feel cozy and inviting rather than dry and administrative.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art with Stardew Valley vibes, chunky sprites, and mandatory lime green (#ecf874) accents.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of an open wooden garden gate inviting new travelers into a lush digital forest. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, flourishing pixel plants and vines. A small wooden sign reads 'WELCOME'. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic, inviting, emotionally warm.
images.description: An inviting entrance to the community, symbolizing the updated onboarding/readme.

images.prompt: Pixel art scene of diverse tiny 8-bit characters gathering around a large unrolled scroll labeled 'DOCS' in a sunny clearing. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender sky. Cozy garden setting with pixel flowers. Chunky pixels, warm lighting. Like Unpacking meets coding. Wholesome community collaboration vibes.
images.description: Visualizing the 'Contributing' and 'Readme' updates as a map or guide for the community.

images.prompt: Close up pixel art of the happy 8-bit Pollinations bee mascot watering a sprouting pixel seedling. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and mint gradient background. Sparkles and bloom effects around the plant. Text in pixel font: 'GROW WITH US'. Warm lighting, cozy retro gaming aesthetic. Emotionally resonant and cute.
images.description: The result of contribution: growth and blooming.
